channel.title: CVE Feed for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO BusinessConnect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO BusinessConnect

item.title: CVE-2023-26214|2024-08-02T11:46:23.429Z -- tibco%20software%20inc. -- tibco%20businessconnect
item.description: The BusinessConnect UI component of TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO BusinessConnect contains easily exploitable Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities that allow a low privileged attacker with network access to execute scripts targeting the affected system or the victim's local system. Affected releases are TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO BusinessConnect: versions 7.3.0 and below.
